channel.title: NPR Topics: National
channel.description: NPR coverage of national news, U.S. politics, elections, business, arts, culture, health and science, and technology. Subscribe to the NPR Nation RSS feed.
channel.copyright: Copyright 2024 NPR - For Personal Use Only

item.title: Researchers say no evidence of TikTok censorship, but they remain wary
item.description: Posts have been going viral on social media accusing TikTok's new owners of suppressing content, but eight academics examined the issue and found no evidence to support the claims.
item.content:encoded:
Posts have been going viral on social media accusing TikTok's new owners of suppressing content, but eight academics examined the issue and found no evidence to support the claims.

(Image credit: Riccardo Milani)
item.dc:creator: Bobby Allyn

item.title: Border czar Tom Homan to immediately reduce federal agents in Minnesota by 700
item.description: The Trump administration is pulling hundreds of ICE agents from Minnesota — and allowing for the possibility of further drawdowns. Border czar Tom Homan says about 2-thousand officers will remain.
item.content:encoded: The Trump administration is pulling hundreds of ICE agents from Minnesota — and allowing for the possibility of further drawdowns. Border czar Tom Homan says about 2-thousand officers will remain.
item.dc:creator: Martin Kaste

item.title: Newly released court records reveal misconduct inquiry into federal judge
item.description: A federal judge said he retired to speak out about threats to the rule of law. Newly released court orders suggest his exit coincided with a misconduct inquiry that ended when he stepped down.
item.content:encoded:
A federal judge said he retired to speak out about threats to the rule of law. Newly released court orders suggest his exit coincided with a misconduct inquiry that ended when he stepped down.

(Image credit: Ricky Carioti/The Washington Post via Getty Images)
item.dc:creator: Carrie Johnson

item.title: The Supreme Court lets California use its new, Democratic-friendly congressional map
item.description: The Supreme Court has cleared the way for California to use its new congressional map for this year's midterm election. Voters approved it as a Democratic counterresponse to Texas' new GOP-friendly map.
item.content:encoded:
The Supreme Court has cleared the way for California to use its new congressional map for this year's midterm election. Voters approved it as a Democratic counterresponse to Texas' new GOP-friendly map.

(Image credit: Ethan Swope)
item.dc:creator: Hansi Lo Wang

item.title: Is the U.S. heading into a dictatorship?
item.description: The Atlantic writer Robert Kagan says as Trump violates norms, laws and the Constitution, including his call to nationalize elections, "we're on the edge of the consolidation of dictatorship."
item.content:encoded: The Atlantic writer Robert Kagan says as Trump violates norms, laws and the Constitution, including his call to nationalize elections, "we're on the edge of the consolidation of dictatorship."
item.dc:creator: Terry Gross

item.title: Search for Nancy Guthrie, mother of 'Today' show host Savannah Guthrie, enters 4th day
item.description: Police in Arizona believe Nancy Guthrie, 84, was taken by force from her Tucson area home this weekend. So far, no suspect or person of interest has been identified.
item.content:encoded:
Police in Arizona believe Nancy Guthrie, 84, was taken by force from her Tucson area home this weekend. So far, no suspect or person of interest has been identified.

(Image credit: Sejal Govindarao)
item.dc:creator: Bill Chappell

item.title: Photos: Scenes from the 150th Westminster Dog Show
item.description: Hundreds of dogs competed for the top prize at the Westminster Kennel Club Dog Show this week. Penny the Doberman pinscher was named best in show.
item.content:encoded:
Hundreds of dogs competed for the top prize at the Westminster Kennel Club Dog Show this week. Penny the Doberman pinscher was named best in show.

(Image credit: Yuki Iwamura)
item.dc:creator: Emily Bogle

item.title: Congress faces tight deadline to fund DHS. And, Ryan Routh faces sentencing
item.description: Congress ended the shutdown, but now faces a tight deadline to fund the Department of Homeland Security. And, the man convicted of attempting to assassinate Trump faces sentencing today.
item.content:encoded:
Congress ended the shutdown, but now faces a tight deadline to fund the Department of Homeland Security. And, the man convicted of attempting to assassinate Trump faces sentencing today.

(Image credit: Aaron Schwartz)
item.dc:creator: Brittney Melton

item.title: How old is too old for a 30-year mortgage? Here's what to consider
item.description: How old is too old for a 30-year mortgage? It's just one of a number of questions that older Americans face when they are looking to buy a home later in life.
item.content:encoded:
How old is too old for a 30-year mortgage? It's just one of a number of questions that older Americans face when they are looking to buy a home later in life.

(Image credit: Mario Tama)
item.dc:creator: Scott Neuman

item.title: The Winter Olympics are upon us. Here's how to follow along
item.description: The Winter Olympics bring hundreds of the world's best winter athletes to northern Italy, where they will face off in 16 different sports across 2 1/2 weeks. Here's how to follow along.
item.content:encoded:
The Winter Olympics bring hundreds of the world's best winter athletes to northern Italy, where they will face off in 16 different sports across 2 1/2 weeks. Here's how to follow along.

(Image credit: Maja Hitij)
item.dc:creator: Rachel Treisman
